idea:
A 2015 established company, We, ASMI Engineering" are leading Manufacturer, Wholesaler, Exporter, Distributor, Supplier, Importer and Service Provider of Torque Wrench, Power Flange Spreader, Hydraulic Nut Splutter, Bolt Tensioner, Torque Multiplier and many more. We are also providing service of these product. The components and raw materials used in the fabrication of the range are acquired from known national and international sources. We not just test the quality of our finished products but also our raw materials after acquiring it.

ASMI Engineering is a reliable business enterprise that offers a broad range of engineering tools and machinery. Based in Mumbai, Maharashtra (India), our company was founded two years back and has gained recognition in the market because of its quality range. We customize the tools and machine for all those sectors in which these tools and machine find their application. Our goods are valued for their impeccable quality, easy usage, high functionality and performance all over the market. By meeting with the demands efficiently, we have become a customer- preferred name of the industry.
name: ASMI ENGINEERRING

idea:
We have built the Retailer aggregation solution comprising of the Customer app and the Retailer App. 

The Customer App helps in locating the nearby Kiranas and also add their preferred Kiranas.  The Customer could search for the necessary Grocery and the list of retailers that have the products would be listed out along with the retailer prices. 

The customer could then go on to place the order on the Kiranas. 

The retailer using the retailer App could accept the order, Pick , pack and deliver the items. 

This application could be extended to the Wholesale/Distributors as well ( B2B).
name: BAZAAR247 MCOMMERCE PRIVATE LIMITED
